text: L'Aiguillon-sur-Mer is a former commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. On 1 January 2022, it was merged into the new commune of L'Aiguillon-la-Presqu'île. == References == Category:Former communes in Vendée
title: L'Aiguillon-sur-Mer
